articles.title: Results of cancer prevention initiative to be presented to EU Parliament

articles.content:

articles.description: Marise Wipani, best known for her roles as Ellie in ITV's Soldier, Soldier and Kanae in Xena: Warrior Princess, has died at 61 years of age
articles.content:
Marise Wipani, best known for her roles as Ellie in ITV's Soldier, Soldier and Kanae in Xena: Warrior Princess, has died at 61 years of age.
